                            int xPosition,
                            int yPosition)
        Checks if a move is possible.
        Parameters:
        token - The Token to describe the original position.
        xPosition - The int to describe the moves new xPosition.
        yPosition - The int to describe the moves new yPosition.
        Returns:
        A Boolean of if the move is valid.
